name: Mal Cobb
description: Mal Cobb is the deceased wife of Dom Cobb and haunts his subconscious as a projection while he performs inception missions.

content.title: Background
content.body: Mal Cobb was born in the mid-20th century and was known for her deep intellectual curiosity and adventurous spirit. She met Dom Cobb at a young age, bonded over their shared interest in dreams, and together, they became experts in shared dreaming technology.

content.title: Personality
content.body: Mal was intelligent and fiercely independent, often challenging Dom with her sharp insights. Her tragic death led to her becoming a darker, aggressive projection in Dom's dreams, reflecting his guilt and unresolved grief.

content.title: Story Role
content.body: Mal's role is pivotal as she represents Cobb's primary obstacle within the subconscious realm. Her presence manifests Dom's unresolved guilt and has a significant influence on the narrative as a constant threat during his missions.

content.title: Relationships
content.body: Mal was deeply in love with her husband, Dom Cobb. Their relationship was passionate but strained by the psychological consequences of their dream-sharing experiments. Her death, ruled a suicide, profoundly impacted Dom, leading him to project a haunting version of Mal in his subconscious.
